ENGLISH: UN Settlement Of Disputes Declaration Delay
The UN Settlement Of Disputes Declaration
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 37/10, The Declaration on the Peaceful Settlement of International Disputes.
The UN Settlement Of Disputes Declaration
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 37/10, The Declaration on the Peaceful Settlement of International Disputes, has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.
Settlement Of Disputes Declaration Fails Vote
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 37/10, The Declaration on the Peaceful Settlement of International Disputes, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
Settlement Of Disputes Declaration Passes Vote
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 37/10, The Declaration on the Peaceful Settlement of International Disputes, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Vote on Settlement Of Disputes Declaration

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 37/10, The Declaration on the Peaceful Settlement of International Disputes.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
